location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Copy of letter No 1653/685 of 1872 from Colonel Lewis Pelly, HBM's Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Bombay, to Lieutenant-Colonel Edward Charles Ross, HBM's Political Agent and Consul, Muscat

mods.abstract: Letter enclosing a copy of Government Resolution No. 6348 of 31 October 1872 concerning the Jannat Khana (house of assembly) of the Khoja community at Muttrah [Matrah] and requesting that he pass on to the Sultan of Muscat the communication outlined in Paragraph two of the resolution.The resolution is no longer enclosed with the letter.
